method.name: log
method.shortDescription: Display message as a log message
method.description: Display message as a log message Usage air.Introspector.Console.log(arg1,[[arg2], [[arg3]...]]])

method.name: error
method.shortDescription: Display message as a error message
method.description: Display message as a error message Usage air.Introspector.Console.error(arg1,[[arg2], [[arg3]...]]])

method.name: info
method.shortDescription: Display message as a info message
method.description: Display message as a info message Usage air.Introspector.Console.info(arg1,[[arg2], [[arg3]...]]])

method.name: warn
method.shortDescription: Display message as a warn message
method.description: Display message as a warn message Usage air.Introspector.Console.warn(arg1,[[arg2], [[arg3]...]]])

method.name: dump
method.description: Display an Object recursively Usage air.Introspector.Console.dump(dumpObject, maxRecursionLevel=2)
